text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid with vertices A, D, B, and C.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line AD is 10.
The length of the line AE is 17.
The length of the line BC is 22.
Point E lies on the line CB.
The line AE is perpendicular to the line EB.
line_instances: There are lines AC, AD, CB, and DB in the diagram.
